com.leonovich.cofeebreak.web.controller

Class CoffeeController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.leonovich.cofeebreak.web.controller.CoffeeController

  • @RestController
@RequestMapping(value="/coffee")
@PropertySource(value="classpath:messages.properties")
public class CoffeeController
extends java.lang.Object
    Created by alexanderleonovich on 30.08.15. Controller of application. Contains methods, what perform the function of operations with coffe entity
